metadata.feature_description: Add new users to the system

steps.expected: Users panel opens with Add User button visible for admin users
steps.actual: Users panel opened with 'Add User' button visible in the top right area

steps.expected: Create User form opens with all required fields
steps.actual: Create User form opened displaying First Name, Last Name, User Name, Email Address, Authorized toggle, Random Password toggle, Password, Confirm Password fields, and Cancel/Save buttons

steps.action: Click Save button with all fields empty
steps.expected: Validation errors shown for all required fields
steps.actual: Red error indicators displayed on First Name, Last Name, User Name, Email Address, Password, and Confirm Password fields

steps.action: Fill all fields with valid data except email (use 'invalidemail' without @ symbol)
steps.actual: Email field displayed red border with error icon indicating invalid email format

steps.expected: Form does not submit, email error persists
steps.actual: Form did not submit, email validation error remained visible

steps.action: Enter different values in Password and Confirm Password fields
steps.expected: Confirm Password field shows mismatch error
steps.actual: Confirm Password field displayed red error indicator indicating password mismatch

steps.expected: Form does not submit, mismatch error persists
steps.actual: Form did not submit, password mismatch validation error remained visible

steps.action: Fill form with valid data: TestFirst TestLast, testnewuser123, testnewuser123@test.com, Pass123456
steps.expected: All fields filled without validation errors
steps.actual: All fields filled correctly with password showing 'strong' indicator, no validation errors

steps.expected: User created successfully, notification shown, user appears in list
steps.actual: User 'TestFirst TestLast' created successfully with success notification, appeared at top of user list with join date 02/28/2026

steps.action: Open Create User form and verify Random Password toggle
steps.expected: Random Password toggle is visible and defaults to Off, with password fields visible
steps.actual: Random Password toggle displayed with 'Off' state, Password and Confirm Password fields visible below

steps.action: Click Cancel button on Create User form
steps.actual: Form closed successfully, returned to user list without any changes

observations: The Create User button visibility is controlled by the canAddUser() function which checks for isAdmin OR ADD_USER permission as per code analysis in Body/index.jsx:98-101
Password strength indicator shows 'strong' label when a secure password is entered
The form uses live validation - errors appear as the user types, not just on submit

Random Password toggle is visible in the UI but testing the toggle interaction was limited by the switch component's accessibility - the toggle state and password field visibility behavior was verified via code review
